sentences.sContent: In part that's because industry is smack in the middle of the city.
sentences.sCn: 部分是因为工业恰恰就在该市的中心地带。

words.tran: 发出声音的接吻；发出咂咂声的人；一块钱

trans.tranCn: 直接地， 准确地， 恰好地； 猛烈地， 急剧地
trans.tranOther: Something that is smack in a particular place is exactly in that place
to have the characteristic smell or flavour (of something)
to hit someone, especially a child, with your open hand in order to punish them

trans.tranCn: 掌掴，拍，打；掌掴声，拍击声；出声地吻，响吻
